Here is a link to a catalogue for an exhibition of works by blind photographers at the California Museum of Photography, University of California Riverside in 2009.  There are 4 short introductory essays plus a gallery of exhibiting artists including images + essays/artist statements.  Please peruse some of this before class on Wednesday.  I apologize for the late notice!   http://138.23.124.165/exhibitions/sightunseen/exh_essay_01_1.htm             Posted on March 29, 2015  Author Georgia Krantz  Leave a comment                  Learning to See Data          An interesting article on perceptual learning   http://www.nytimes.com/2015/03/29/sunday-review/learning-to-see-data.html?hp&action=click&pgtype=Homepage&module=c-column-top-span-region&region=c-column-top-span-region&WT.nav=c-column-top-span-region             Posted on March 29, 2015  Author Georgia Krantz  Leave a comment                  Touch tours in Madrid          Thanks for the heads up, Fatima!
